extractedData.name: HARISH SEKAR
extractedData.title: Senior Software Engineer
extractedData.summary: Senior Software Engineer with 8 years of comprehensive experience in dotnet core enterprise application development, cloud integration, and microservices architecture. Proven expertise in leading complex ERP integrations, designing scalable solutions using Azure technologies, Azure Devops and implementing modern architectural patterns including Saga microservices. Strong background in Backend development with demonstrated success in migrating legacy systems to cloud-native architectures and dotnet core architecture.

experience.description: Spearheaded productization initiative by designing and implementing Saga architecture-based dotnet core microservices, successfully migrating customer-specific Logic Apps.
achievements: Led comprehensive ERP integration solutions for Sage100 and QuickBooks Online using Azure Logic Apps.
Architected Azure Blob Storage mechanism to optimize API call efficiency, reducing order creation API calls by 60%.

experience.description: Developed .NET API endpoints to integrate with Boomi middleware for EDI transform.
achievements: Contributed to architecture decisions and technical design reviews.
Developed core .NET components for file processing dispatcher and routing.

experience.description: Designed and developed Azure Logic Apps to automate business workflows and integrate third-party systems.
achievements: Successfully onboarded 15+ new clients to Azure platform, managing end-to-end migration processes.

experience.description: Developed .NET Core web application enabling cross-functional teams to submit builds for QA testing.
achievements: Automated email reporting system, reducing manual effort and improving stakeholder communication.

experience.description: Built .NET Core web application streamlining workflows between insurance companies and healthcare providers.
achievements: Automated Excel template generation process, reducing processing time from hours to minutes.

experience.description: Developed .NET Core web application for managing technical interview processes.
achievements: Integrated Python-based quiz engine with C# backend for automated candidate assessment.

experience.description: Implemented Moodle-based Learning Management System for enterprise training programs.
achievements: Prepared detailed project proposals including risk assessment, timeline estimation, and resource planning.
